snippet.title: Swift Animations: Hit Testing Facebook Like (Ep 2)
snippet.description:
Episode 1: https://youtu.be/wbmTy32s7GQ

Let's wrap up this short series by expanding our animation feature. This lesson will cover UIStackView and Hit Testing to animate the emoji icons in our container.  Enjoy.
